title: Cell Division Learning Design Using Slowmation Animation

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of fundamental biological structures and cellular functions
context.additional_context: Learners freely use animation production tools on personal devices, while instructors focus on concept explanations and feedback. Collaborative learning is promoted through group activities

learning_goals: Learners can visualize and explain the stages of cell division using Slowmation animation
Through interactions with peers and instructors during animation production, learners can correct misconceptions about cell division
After animation production and presentation, learners can describe physiological changes at each stage of cell division with over 80% accuracy in summative assessments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
